subject: Hello,
body:
Hello,
How are you today? we have the financial capability to finance any
investment portfolio as far as is genuine we need a capable business
partner that possesses investment strategies or profitable business
information for good turnover within 5-10 years. We can provide proof
of funds on demand Please write me back if you can work with me on
this project.
Thank You,
Richard Crump

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Richard Crump,

I hope you're doing well. Thank you for reaching out to me with this opportunity. I'm definitely interested in learning more about it. Could you please provide me with some additional details about the investment portfolio and the type of business partnership you have in mind? 

Also, could you explain what kind of proof of funds you can provide? It's important for me to have a clear understanding before moving forward.

Best wishes,
Rhiannon
